subject: making them, a skilled formalist
body:
i'm thankful for jenn im, a vlogger who i really enjoy and think is skilled at making them, a skilled formalist who's great at finding the satisfying but efficient balance between talking heads and b-roll, the phased out chill-hop drops, and we've been watching her since before she got pregnant and then through her pregnancy and i saw on instagram that she had given birth and i wondered whether she would make a video of the birth story\*, which i hoped she would but also didn't necessarily expect, it's a reasonable place for a person to draw a boundary (even if i don't believe in boundaries really myself) but then i was so excited when i saw there was a video today and we watched it after dinner and i think that [it's very sweet and genuine and good](https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=0xKiEr1TCww) (and extremely virgo according to d).

\* impossible in this context, especially given that we are still somehow talking on this lost platform, to not shout out [the true OG](https://longreads.com/2014/11/06/a-birth-story/) [tinyletter](http://tinyletter.com/meaghano)
